item.title: About
item.description: A full-stack software engineer in Bengaluru. I’m currently work as a backend engineer at Atlassian. I enjoy reading stuff on lobste.

item.title: Primer: Designing a health-check API
item.description: If you are working on a web application, be it a monolith, micro-service or even serverless architecture, you should be able to find out very easily whether your application is healthy or not, and if it isn’t, then it shouldn’t be serving any traffic at all.
